page.title: 17Bideford:S+SE.Page 16 Cont.
page.content: __Cont.-I have a small garden with a pond with fish in.There are quite a lot of factories East-the-Water like A.M.P. Leisure Industries,Atlas and toy factor -ies along the Alverdiscott Rd.There are some lovely country lanes leading to Weare Giffard,Torrington and Barnsta -ple.The Kingsley Hospital for mentally handicapped people is just along the road.The most popular place to walk to is the reservoir(Gammaton)where you can swim.At the Community Centre in Avon Lane there are some swings and slides and a B.M.X.track.Near where I live there are, a wool-shop,a newsagents,a greengrocers and a clothes shop.A bit further down the road there is a fish and chip shop and an off-licence.(th- ough these are just out of the area). The next account of home-life East-the- Water, is from a short distance away by an older girl with help from a friend.
